content.text:
# Volvarina wareni

Volvarina wareni is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Marginellidae, the margin snails.
Description
The length of the shell attains 8.34 mm, its diameter 3.49 mm.
Distribution
This marine species occurs off Guadeloupe in the Caribbean Sea.

(2012) Nuevas especies de la familia Marginellidae (Mollusca: Neogastropoda) de la isla Guadalupe (Karukera), Antillas Menores, Mar Caribe. Revista de la Academia Canaria de Ciencias 24(3): 119-151.]
